### Week 3 Overview

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus" = c(unchecked,
              checked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked,
            unchecked,
            checked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked),

Description = c("Complete modules in Data Camp that addresses data wrangling and more basic statistics in R.",
"Create a draft of your instrument",
"Read a few papers on the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator and create a post",
"Read chapters on quantitative data and testing",
"Watch an optional video on the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator",
"Go though an R walkthrough looking at recoding items through the lens of the Big Five personality traits"),

Location = c("[Link](/datacamp/03-module/)",
             "[Link](/tasks/03-tasks/#develop-a-draft)",
"[Link](/readings/03-readings/#read-some-papers)",
"[Link](/readings/03-readings/#review-some-materials)",
"[Link](/readings/03-readings/#watch-an-optional-video)",
             "[Link](/walkthroughs/03-walkthrough/)")

)
```
